Paragraph: Clarithromycin is the most documented cytochrome P450 3A4 ( CYP3A4 ) inhibitor to cause an adverse interaction with simvastatin .

There are no disease entities mentioned in the given paragraph. The paragraph only mentions two drugs, Clarithromycin and Simvastatin, and an enzyme, cytochrome P450 3A4 (CYP3A4). Therefore, there are no disease entities in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Paragraph: Clarithromycin is the most documented cytochrome P450 3A4 ( CYP3A4 ) inhibitor to cause an adverse interaction with simvastatin .

After removing irrelevant entities:

* Adverse interaction

The entity "adverse interaction" refers to a negative reaction or side effect that occurs when two or more drugs are taken together. While it is related to the concept of disease, it is not a disease entity in and of itself. Therefore, the only disease entity in the paragraph is:

* None
